feed.title: Formbricks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: fix response client api endpoint is missing environmentId by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5161
  • chore(infra): increase ressource limits to 1 cpu & 1Gi mem by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5192
  • fix: adding back hidden fields for backwards compatibility by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5163
  • chore: remove posthog provider from top layout by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5169
  • chore: changes storage cache to 5 minutes by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5196
  • chore: remove unused tailwind import from mobile SDK webviews by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5198
  • chore: update storybook app dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5195
  • fix: consent/cta back button issue by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5201
  • fix: added cache no-store when formbricksDebug is enabled by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5197
  • fix: (Security) implement HSTS by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5206
  • chore: update demo app dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5207
  • fix: bulk member invite and table layout by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5209
  • chore: update SHARE_RATE_LIMIT to 50 request per 5 minute by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5194
  • fix: skip button label validation for required nps and rating questions by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5153

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.7.0...v3.7.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.0
entry.content:
This release extends the Management API to support user and team management. It also moves API key management from the project level to the organization level. To manage API keys, a Manager or Owner role is now required.

The data migration that moves existing API keys to the new location runs automatically when Formbricks is updated.

What's Changed

  • feat: lastLoginAt to user model by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5216
  • feat: organization endpoints by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5076
  • feat: user endpoints by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5232
  • chore(deps): bump SonarSource/sonarqube-scan-action from 4.2.1 to 5.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5104
  • chore: Api keys to org level by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5044
  • chore: added isActive to user model by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5211
  • chore: block signin with SSO when user is not found by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5233
  • chore: update root npm dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5208
  • chore: update vite & vitest dependency versions by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5217
  • fix: don't allow spaces as "other" values in select questions by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5224
  • fix: failing e2e test by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5234
  • fix: upgrade npm dependencies with high security risk by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.7.1...v3.8.0

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Refactored the Formbricks next public env variables and added test files by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5014
  • chore: Refactored the Turnstile next public env variable and added test files by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4997
  • chore: add docker build check github action by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4875
  • chore: make mock passwords more obvious to test suites by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5240
  • chore: update apps/web npm dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5300
  • chore: update eslint npm dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5313
  • chore: update surveys package npm dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5302
  • chore: upgrade demo app to tailwind v4 by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5237
  • chore: upgrade npm dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5299
  • chore: use remote turbocache for building formbricks by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5305
  • docs: fixes framework guide link by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5307
  • docs: updated API playground link in the webhooks docs by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5301
  • feat: Added test configuration and initial test files to the surveys package by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5253
  • feat: personalized survey links for segment of users endpoint by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5032
  • fix: Add Cache-Control to allowed CORS headers by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5252
  • fix: adds date value check in date question summary by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5296
  • fix: adds isWebEnvironment check in the surveys package by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5310
  • fix: appUrl fix in iOS and android packages by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5295
  • fix: date format in response table by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5304
  • fix: fixes segment self referencing issue by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5254
  • fix: formbricks version on localhost by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5250
  • fix: ios package sonarqube fixes by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5249
  • fix: removes sourcemaps by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5257
  • fix: replace hard-coded alerts with alert component by @jakobsitory in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5156
  • fix: solve sonarqube security hotspots by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5292
  • fix: stripe issue for customers with existing stripe ID by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5308

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.8.0...v3.8.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: removes api package and deps by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5251
  • fix: openAPI spec for contact endpoints by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5247
  • fix: updatedAt not set in response update by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5315
  • fix: respondent should not see redirect card text by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5239
  • docs: updates the API keys docs in API reference by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5319
  • chore: upgrade typescript and react dependencies by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5317
  • fix: adds FormbricksEnvironment struct for url constants by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5312
  • chore: improve accessibility for matrix question by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5320

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.8.1...v3.8.2

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.8.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: buttonLabel conditions by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5336
